name: Roland Vance
text: Excellent service provider. I will definitely refer Quality to others.

name: earlene welton
text: Loved the customer service. Abbey is amazing. Thank you Renegade. This was my first experience, but it won't be my last.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Trent Gressett
text: Best summer sausage ever! The jalapeño/cheese smoked sausage has a great taste also but casing is a little big. Haven’t tried the burger yet but heard from others that it’s great too.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Cole Rogers
text: Great people with great results

resp.text: Thank you

name: Tim Sowell
text: Will not go anywhere else!

resp.text: Thank you!

name: John Price
text: Very friendly. Great place to get your deer processed

resp.text: Thank you John Price. We appreciate your business

name: Akinajin
text: Great quality meats. Friendly owners. Highly recommended. Support small business!

name: Corey Baginski
text: Fast, friendly service. Wide selection of meats, great family packs.

name: Ethan Darby
text: This is the only place I will bring my deer to be processed. They have good prices, they produce a very high quality product, and if there ever is a mistake they go far above what is expected in order to make it right.  If you need animals processed, this place is the only place you should go. We love all the deer meat we pick up from there, from burger to summer sausage, it's all fantastic and packaged well.

name: Kevin Taylor
text: They do a wonderful job at great prices!! Been using them for years now and will never go anywhere else. Never a bad job. Pull up, drop off, tell them the cuts you want, drive off, they call you,  pay and pick up. Simple as that. I have gotten many of my friends to use them as far away as bham. They still use them.

name: Kevin Faires
text: Awesome job,and  Quick.

name: Budmcintyre57
text: Great Deer processing at a fair price,  very friendly folks , large variety of different types of meat packaging

name: Marc Garrett
text: Great place, affordable prices and friendly staff. Definately reccomended

name: Ernest McCurry
text: Great place to take your meat.  Always vacuum sealed

name: mitchell clifton
text: They do a good job taking care of your meat. Excellent packing and hours are very convieant.

name: IcyTOXIC KAM
text: Always Right great service

name: cpobriens
text: Great place to buy top quality steaks and meat. Friendly family owned business in Daphne.

name: Robert Crouch
text: These guys are of the chain. They are very knowledgeable and extremely helpful. The meat is always fresh and flavourful.

name: Brian Cain
text: Mosley's is the best meat market in Baldwin County. The service is great and the food is phenomenal. They have great fresh oysters from Bon Secour as well.

name: K. L.
text: CHRIS AND THE STAFF ARE VERY NICE PEOPLE AND THE MEATS ARE AWESOME AND THE TWICE BAKED POTATOES  ETC😎😎 GO SEE THEM 🥩🥩🍗🍗🥓🥓🎄🎄⛄⛄ HAPPY HOLIDAYS

name: Cecelia Asberry
text: Best meat market in town. Steaks are great! Going to try the short ribs next.

name: Jimmy B
text: Love supporting local businesses, The Big Green Egg has a tremendous footprint in the store, but the meat selection is impressive.  The entire staff seems to be working towards keeping the customers happy.  Third time was a charm!!

name: S S
text: Customer service towards minorities needs improvement.

name: Sally Smith
text: Nice market with a large selection.  Just don't feel comfortable not knowing the price of the meats and you have to ask.  If they would show the price of their steaks would rate this place 10 stars.

name: Paddy Cuileann
text: Their meats are good, but the service is extremely unfriendly. I won’t be returning.

name: Sheila Corcoran
text: I go to Mosley's because of the best meat's and Specialty products like their stuffed chicken and pork chops with a crawfish sausage stuffing. The employees are the nicest and friendliest and go out if there way to please you and make you feel very much like family. Jenny is the most caring person I've ever met and the man behind the counter went out of his way to make sure I got the best and freshest meat I ordered. The owner should be very proud to have them as employees.

name: Bobby Pounds
text: Good selection, great tasting, always helpful,

name: Bill Tasso
text: Real friendly & fast service... Very reasonable prices. Primo meats and a bunch of other stuff too.

name: aaron cordle
text: I can't say enough good things about this place.  Many terrific meals have been shared over food bought from Mosley's Fine Meat. The wine selection is good as well.  I've bought and maintained 2 grills from them as well.

name: That Guy Mack
text: Walked in to ask some questions about some fat to cut into my meat they had some but they couldn't grind it, okay no big deal there. Well after I was still browsing the guys started talking about me like I was stupid while I was still standing there. I was highly disappointed and immediately left after I planned on buying something.

name: Jennifer Rowley
text: The Daphne location was amazing. They were able to immediately fill an order for the holiday.

name: Forrest Derr
text: They have the best filet’s in town.

name: Joel Cadenhead
text: Great meats among other super items. Their chicken salad is the best.

name: Zack Martin
text: Great steaks and very friendly people!

name: Debra Myers
text: People were friendly. Service was excellent.

name: Vickie Amburgey
text: Fresh meat, friendly service,  the little chickens are awesome.

name: george pancner
text: Best Meats on the Eastern Shore and in Mobile!

name: G P
text: Great service and great meat

name: Sara Watson
text: Friendly staff, clean store!

name: Lavinia Sparkman
text: Great meats and service !!

name: Mike Allen
text: Great meats!

name: Jayme Moore
text: I read good reviews of this place, but I was still a little skeptical when I pulled up. It was an older convenience store type establishment, but there was a lot of traffic going in and out. I went inside and checked out the hot bar, and it actually looked pretty good, with a pretty good variety. Meat and two was $7.99, and I had catfish, mac and cheese, and broccoli casserole, and it was actually very tasty. I'm glad we took a chance on this place.

name: Joe Alflen
text: Very unfriendly on the phone. Didn't even know what dry aged meat was. Only had one cut (ribeye) available. Not sure why this place is called a butcher market

name: Geef Bronson
text: The staff's great people great cooking also and very convenient been going for years an will not stop anytime soon

name: Kenny Hollinhead
text: Good food at a good price. Lunch specials are the best option. However, they have recently closed but haven't opened back up yet. More to come when they open up again.

name: Art Faulkner
text: Had a great lunch from there today. Staff was friendly. Food was great. Will definitely go back again.

resp.text: Thanks visit again

name: Jolene Patton
text: I was looking for a real butcher shop. Did not find one here. I needed skirt steak and short ribs, there was nothing but a few steaks in the display. Nothing like the picture. Highly disappointing!! I drove 20 minutes to get there. Ugh!!

name: J Dixon
text:
This location is currently closed. I hope they can get this facility cleaned up, repaired, and reopened soon. This market was a wonderful asset to the area!

The staff was professional & helpful every time I visited....

name: ann heartsill
text: Great food, best beer prices I have seen in a while, Pick 5 for 5 on meats. They have unusual items.  Friendly staff.  Hope they keep it up. they will do great if they dont get greedy.

resp.text: thanks now we have lot more deals in meat buy more get more good price

name: Robbie Rasberry
text:
Awesome selection of food items everyday.
Loved the jalapeno macaroni and cheese and pulled pork.
Excellent value for the price!

name: Steve Grauberger
text: Good deal on meat and 3 plate.  I had a great fried pork chop.  They sell groceries and cook whatever you want.

name: Rachel Moore
text: Love to go get some home cooking! Got great bbq! And quality service.

name: Ricky Thomas
text: Great place to grab a quick bite to eat and just love the pulled pork sandwiches hats off the te pit man

name: Jason R Brown
text: Cant complain they open late

name: Andrew McDonald
text: The owners and employees are extremely nice and they serve some damn fine barbeque. It is well worth the extra few miles out the Old Selma Hwy but it is well worth the drive.

name: Cheryl Smith
text: Wonderful store, friendly staff and great service. The deli food is good, as so the boston butts.

resp.text: thanks visit us again we have lot more variety been added in food

name: Rocky Lusane
text: It has really great burgers and a different menu everyday with great selections

name: Betty Shepard-Lysek
text: Always good service and good food  👍

resp.text: thanks visit us again

name: Nikki Mouse
text: Really good food at pretty good prices

resp.text: thanks

name: Burnette Plumbing
text: Great customer service

name: vince manale
text: Good food.

resp.text: thanks. Visit us again

name: Will May
text: Great ribs

name: Lisa Hand
text: How close it is to my house

name: Danny Bolt
text: Loop in

name: Joshua Hines
text: Excellent place very nice and always open during deere season

name: Robert Young
text: Nice people. Great job processing deer!!

name: Ac Blackmon
text: Very friendly!

name: Sheila Lawrence
text: Friendly & helpful staff. Good selections.

name: Eddie Wells
text: Nice and friendly people clean store

name: Darnellroks
text: Friendly staff ,clean ,nice selection

name: Lisa King
text: Awesome!!!

name: Breanna Berry
text: Marty always delivers exceptional service!

name: scott fleck
text: GREAT quality meats!! And love there Ribeye's.

name: dwain white
text: It used to be a great place but I stopped in a week ago and when I opened the door, a wave of cigarette smoke hit me in the face. The shop reeked of smoke. Everything in the freezer cases were coated in a thick layer of ice crystals. I reluctantly bought a bag of orange rolls because I was weary of buying meat in that environment. Sure enough, when I opened the package at home they stunk. I would be afraid of what the fresh meat would have tasted like.

name: Sharon Srutka
text: Awesome place! Great Meat, service and value!

name: Brian Riley
text: This is a great place to get great meat and other cooking essentials. He is small but that is the best part.

name: Usagi Kage-Tsuki (Sailor Shadow Moon)
text: Love them, they're great, good prices on meat that's actually good for you because unlike grocery store meat, this is chemical free!

name: Jacob Robinson
text: Excellent service, quality, and prices.

name: Jenny Hyatt
text: If anyone owns a average size freezer,you can save big!

name: Graham C
text: The best authentic Mexican food in town. Tacos are to die for!

name: Retrocreeper 3000
text: Theater nice

name: John Hancock
text: Great food...Fresh made tortillas....love it

name: Charles Forehand
text: Nice little store.

name: Lopez.HANDYMAN CHAPIN
text: Really good place to eat

name: Nathaniel Alvarado
text: Good food slow service

name: maria sanchez
text: Very good service and great food!!!

name: Billy Brown
text: Excellent food great service

name: JJ Waagh
text:
Does a great job thus far this year. Prices are very competitive with a very personal level of service.

I feel as though I'm getting a better product and tastier meat than I've gotten with my previous processor.

The stew meat is meticulously clean and lean and you cannot pass up on getting some of his cubed steak.

name: angela rose
text: Curbside is awesome, in store shopping is great and delivery is also great we love you here at Northport Fish and Things!!!

name: Zet D
text: Pretty good spot if u lookin for those good deals they have them! Meat man Mike does me pretty good with his Customer Service!!

name: Ray Burkhalter
text: Love the selection of frozen veggies and the fresh meats. Potato pearls were great too!

name: Jennifer Nicole Haven-Cammon
text: Love it real busy at closing but that didn't stop the employee's from stopping what they were doing and help you even being busy we still got out very1 quickly . Prices are very fair as well.

name: Chris Booker
text:
Well stocked great customer service
Mike the meat man was awesome knows all
Charlie was great friendly and helped until I was finished

name: Will Pitman
text: Great customer service. Went in looking for a very specific cut of beef (123A short ribs, the rib section from rib 6-8 untrimmed). They went into the back and got me a huge pack of the exact cut specified for a ton of perfect Texas BBQ in my smoker. Will be back for packer briskets and more beef ribs.

name: Jeanette Conner
text: They have great prices but can be tricky with the weight of their products.

name: Mattie Hughes
text: I like south's finest Meat i wish they had one in Northport . they always have just what you need at a good price. Please put one back in Northport.

name: Darlette James
text: Clean store ,Great Employee,helpful Staff

name: Edward Richardson
text: I wanted to give a shout out to Souths Finest Meats and Vegetables. I ordered some NY Strip steaks from them and they were the best steaks I've ever had! They even cut up your meat to your liking and vacuum seal it! If you're tired of fighting with folks at Walmart and Target...give these people a try! I am usually in and out in under 20 minutes. You won't be disappointed!

name: Krystal Young
text: They were too busy to provide a safe shopping experience today. No curbside pickups, even for high risk or elderly customers.

name: Bo Graham
text: The people there is very friendly, the prices are great, and they have a great selection of products.

name: Sandii Cain
text: Great! Very prompt and courteous service. Great prises

name: Kimberly Jeffries
text: Love the prices and the customer service is outstanding👍

name: Whyyy Though
text: The atmosphere ALONE is so welcoming. The Owner & All of the Employees make sure to give the best service & quality that satisfies everyone who comes to visit & shop in TUSCALOOSA, AL off of Greensboro Avenue"-- TY for providing the Best Services To EACH & EVERY Customer who Enters either South's Locations... TY TY Mr. Dave your the Best DELIVERING QUALITY products throughout ALABAMA & so on...

name: Helen M
text: They had just what I was looking for, fast and friendly service.

name: Cleatiss White
text: Great place Great meat selection 💯

name: Brian Harbin
text: One stop shop for cooking if you don't see it just ask they have lots of stuff in the back no line no wait

name: Aaron Bell
text: Everytime I visit there it's crowed and the workers are very busy but they make  time  to help customers and treats you with kindness. ❤

name: Brittany
text: Great value, great customer service.  Love it will be shopping there in near future. Wide variety of food and you can buy fresh frozen food in bulk.

name: Imogene Shelton
text: Drop of for a few meats and ice cream.cleAn place with friendly help associate handicapped parking and slanted walk way.

name: Tender But5
text: If u like old frozen products were the dates are changed then this is the place for you old meat is washed off and put back out for sale I no cause I worked there for 10 years

name: denise colburn
text: As always if rest product

name: magical asian (Gimmedachocs.)
text:
Very nice establishment. Coming from a picky eater, I have to rate this store 5 stars.

The meat is of good quality with lower price than Walmart or other full stock market.

My only wish would be that they had more veggies like garlics and yellow onions.

name: Talk with Tre
text: Nice deals but had hamburger meat spoil from here rather quickly. Even if frozen once unthawed it smelt spoild

name: Leila Crump
text: The owner has always been so generous to our community and never passes up an opportunity to help others in need. I love South's Finest!!

name: Jason Weekley
text: Great products and people

name: Sonja Doss
text: Best place to buy meats and frozen veggies.

name: Warren
text:
This review is for their mail order service.

I’ve spent a lot of time in the south, but I live in Idaho. I have come to appreciate the Conecuh sausage but I can’t get it anywhere out west.

I tried to order straight from Conecuh but they wanted $145 to ship it to me.

A quick google search brought up South’s Finest Meats. I’ve never heard of them but I took a chance because their shipping was $100 less than ordering straight from Conecuh..... Jackpot!!

They came through big time! I made a decent sized order, and crossed my fingers. My order arrived VERY well packaged and frozen solid.... but there was one small problem. The order wasn’t completely right. A quick call to The South’s Finest Meat and all was rectified.

They made the mistake right. For free. No questions asked. You really can’t beat that type of customer service.

I will DEFINITELY be a repeat customer. Thanks guys for all your help!!

name: kelly Burroughs
text: My favorite butcher

name: J Frost
text: I'm not Impressed. Good place to buy catfish bait

name: Cindy Redick
text: Shop ☆local☆ Shop South's Finest Meats and Vegetables ,you won't be disappointed

name: Lisa Bailey
text: So helpful and the quality of meat in above the best!

name: Barbara Isaac
text: Every  one  was  very  nice  and  friendly

name: Eric Turpin
text: Over-priced, but nice selection. Only buy things there that you can't find somewhere else.

name: Amy Brown
text: Excellent customer service!! They all go above & beyond for each customer!!

name: Maya Brown
text: Super affordable

name: Michael Clark
text: TNT burgers are awesome on the grill.

name: Bad News Gary Brown
text: Best meats in town.

name: Alfatima Robinson
text: Very friendly

name: Lenora Lampkin
text: Great

name: Guest “Iknowwhoiam” Who
text: Easy to get in and out

name: Lewis Hill
text: mmmnn.  good

name: James White
text: Sausage is great and the Venisonburger was awesome on the grill! Will definitely go back if I get blessed with another deer next season..

name: Rob Trujillo
text: Quiet at Christmas! So glad we could drop off on the holiday!

name: Larry Butler
text: Best smoked Sausage

name: Wesley Ransom
text: Absolutely the best steaks you can buy. Little pricey but you will realize it's worth every penny after you take it off the grill. Be sure to get the finishing butter also.

name: Julia Peart
text: We really enjoyed our lunch. The meatloaf sandwich and Turkey club were so fresh and good...service is awesome, oh and we bought a huge loaf of bread to take home!

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit! Please stop by again soon!

name: Gary Rush
text: Great food and great service. Environment is fun and staff make sure your satisfied with your order. First time visit, but will definitely return.

name: Kim Ouellette
text: The Italian sandwich is so good ( I heat it up)   big enough for two meals.   I love the crown filets...they cook up nicely and melt in your mouth.  Service with a smile.

name: Danny Neaves
text: Okay, I've heard a little bit about this place from word of mouth. Didn't realize they prepared food for you to eat on site. I thought they were only a butcher shop type of grocery store. They are a restaurant, and that is why I came by to try them out. I had a burger, and wow it was really good. It is a big burger, fresh, thick, and juicy. There are other sandwich style meals they offer with a variety of different meats and veggies. I will be back to get some cuts of meat to try out and to try some of the other sandwiches too. I have only had it the one time, but I would recommend it based on what I have had so far. Looking forward to trying some other stuff too!!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in to check us out! We’re so glad you enjoyed your burger and hope you’ll stop back in again soon!

name: Tim Lowe
text: I drove through today to get lunch.  This cheeseburger is solid.  The people here are so nice, too.  I'm gonna make it a point to drive through here more often.

name: jettt111
text: We just had the Italian hoagies ( with their fresh made bread ) and heated up. It was the best sandwich I’ve ever had. Way more quality Meat and flavors than subway , I’ll get the hamburger next time. It’s unlike any other around

name: pJ Smitherman
text: The price for two usda prime filets was very high, considering I was unable to taste a difference from that of a grocery store chain usda prime steak. I overpaid expecting a better steak and was let down. Cant say I would make the trip to smiley brothers again. Staff was friendly but for $60 a lb I’ll try somewhere else next time.

name: Cre Hill
text: Best Burger I’ve had in a long time!! Fresh, seasoned and of great quality!

name: Julian king
text: Food is amazing. Service is impeccable. Not many places you go to that the owner is working the drive thru and greeting everyone. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Julian! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Cindy McRee
text: What a unique find! Dryed, aged beef! Unique cheeses you cannot hardly get anywhere else. Too many unique homemade items to mention such as pickles, sauerkraut, breads, etc. As must for an early evening of a glass of wine, a few cheeses, sliced meats and quality conversation with a friend or significant other.

resp.text: Thanks so much Cindy! We hope you’ll visit again soon :)

name: Life Is Brewtiful
text: I absolutely loved this place! The owner and sous chef we're incredibly helpful, attentive, and polite. They were very knowledgeable of their products, provided samples of anything requested and seemed to have a genuine passion for their profession. I loved being able to see the high end and made in house products be made either through the window into the kitchen or in their air drying system for their meats. The sandwiches we're absolutely delicious and made with an obviously higher caliber of product quality than you will find anywhere else in the area. And for the (on average) $10 you get chips and a drink as well. You can even call in and pick up your order at a later time! Now some people will say that the prices are too high, and to a point I agree. However, I also appreciate that this is a premium product with supurb quality which demands and justifes a higher price. Seems fair to me. In my opinion this place is too good for Pelham.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We're glad you decided to stop in and we hope you've enjoyed everything!

name: Robyn Arrieche
text: Let’s face it, they know what they are doing here. I had the Wagyu Pastrami sandwich toasted that was VERY good. However, my only critique was that there was an overpowering taste of saltiness coming from the mustard or the sauerkraut which was disappointing because the meat was soooo good.

name: Rick McCoy
text: Best in town. Bar none.

name: Doug Cole
text:
Went for the first time last night and wasn't disappointed.  Criss was extremely knowledgeable about the various cuts of meat and the dry aging process.  I felt like I was attending a culinary class.  The meal was excellent!
I'll definitely be back for seconds!

name: Taylor Hart
text: It was SO good. That Jon Green guy is a dream.  That meatloaf sandwich though.... it's a winner.

name: Danita Ryan
text: I stopped in from work at about 4:00 p.m. to grab a chicken salad sandwich. I rate it a 10, it was delicious and fresh. Smiley Brothers is a different place but when you walk in the door you know that you are about to receive great service and wonderful food. I recommend it to everyone. I love their customer service because if you don't know they have time to talk you through it and you can have it your way.

resp.text: Thank you for such a kind review! We’re so glad you enjoyed everything and hope you’ll stop by and see us again soon!

name: Dennis Tymkiw
text: Prime grade dry-aged steaks cut to order. Loaded baked potatoes ready to warm up and devour. They pickle their corned beef and make their own pastrami. Select cheese and wine. A jewel of a store with a knowledgeable staff. Foodies-don't miss this place.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Dennis!

name: Dennis Tymkiw
text: Prime grade dry-aged steaks cut to order. Loaded baked potatoes ready to warm up and devour. They pickle their corned beef and make their own pastrami. Select cheese and wine. A jewel of a store with a knowledgeable staff. Foodies-don't miss this place.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Dennis!

name: David Vaughn
text: Outstanding Italian beef sandwich today. Highly recommend

name: Christina Klockow Runnels
text: We have eaten there a few times and everything we have gotten has been delicious! Everything is fresh and seasoned perfectly and their cookies are out of this world! My favorite is the pimento cheese and my husband always gets the club sandwich. Looking forward to trying the chicken salad next! We are so lucky to have this gem in our town!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We’re so glad you liked what you tried and can’t wait to hear what you think of our house made chicken salad!

name: rene generoso
text: Great meat great cheese and great high prices haha

name: Marnie Reineke
text: Highly recommend if you are in the Birmingham area!  They prepared an amazing meal to go for our daughter’s soccer team and everyone enjoyed it. Terrific selection of delicious meats, cheeses  and other specialty foods  that works for one or a large group. Can’t say enough good things about both  the shop and the people who work there.

resp.text: Marnie, you're too kind! Thank you for such a thoughtful review, we're so glad you enjoyed your Smiley Brothers experience!

name: Darlene Talton
text:
Smiley Brothers has great deli sandwiches. They make most all of their ingredients on site. Everything is fresh made. They put plenty on your sandwich. They have a large selection of cheeses.
They do catering and cooler packages. Friendly and helpful employees.

resp.text: Thank you Darlene for your kind words!

name: Vintowsi Farms
text:
Traveling from Sacramento, California to Florida in an RV and stopped for a sandwich. Little did we know this would be the best sandwich of our trip!    So delish!
Criss knows quality, and he delivers that.
Wow, soooooo good and fresh!
Will stop again on our way back to Sacramento.

resp.text: We’re so glad you stopped by and that you loved your sandwich! THANK YOU!

name: QuantumPolagnus
text: My wife and I came here with no idea what they even sold.  We found out they sell lunch, so my wife got their Special Burger and I got a bowl of their Tomato Soup.  They showed us around and told us more about what they do as the food was being prepared.  Apparently the burger was a house recipe combination of different steaks ground together with butter, parsley, etc.  Suffice it to say that the burger was one of the best we have ever had.  The soup was also really good and creamy with shredded gouda and croutons on it.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review and for stopping by to give us a try! We so glad you enjoyed what you tried and hope you’ll come back and see us again soon!

name: Scott Lamoreaux
text: We have had almost every sandwich on the menu and each one has top quality Meats, cheese and bread. All of the take-home meats and items are as good as you will find in this area. Of course it's not cheap because it's the best. Also the only place I know of locally that has true dry aged beef.

resp.text: Hi Scott, thanks for the kind words! We're glad you've enjoyed the sandwiches and hope you'll come back and see us again soon!

name: Candace Herron
text: Great roast beef sandwich!  Also picked up some house made sausages and cheese.  I plan to come back for some dry aged steaks soon.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review Candace!

name: Garrett Bowling
text: I finally branched out and tried something other than the beloved Meatloaf Sandwich....OMG am I glad I did because the Wagyu pastrami sandwich was AMAZING! The tangy house made pickles, cut through the rich fatty goodness of the Wagyu. The whole grain mustard and swiss cheese round out the flavors and it is served on wonderfully toasted Rye. Now the only problem I have is what to try next!

name: Chris Ashley
text: Bland sandwiches. Roast beef especially bad possibly expired or old.  Had club, roast beef, and chik salad.

name: Em
text: Wonderful place with friendly staff!

resp.text: Thanks Emily!

name: David Price
text: The staff was super friendly and helpful.  I had their cheese burger with a lettuce wrap instead of bun.  In my opinion, it is the best cheese burger in Shelby County.

resp.text: Thank you David for such a nice review! We’re so glad you enjoyed your burger!

name: Jonathan Eidson
text: The meat here is a premium product, so expect to pay a premium price. You’ll end up with a better steak from your own grill than you’d get at any place outside of a $100+ per plate fine dining restaurant for much less. The staff is friendly and willing to spend time discussing their products with you. Definitely will go to again for a fine steak dinner at home with the wife or other special meals.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! Please come back and see us soon!

name: Tommy Barberini
text: Had an amazing sandwich but you better bring your appetite! Dry/wet aged meat available as well. Will definitely be back.

resp.text: Thanks Tommy! Hope you and your appetite are able to stop by again soon :)

name: Bill Burn
text: Had the Smiley Burger over the weekend and this is absolutely the best burger in bham! This thing is stacked tall and they apparently have butter in their beef mix! The cheddar is melted over the meat dripping down the toppings. They have lots of great sandwiches, but this is my new favorite! I would pit it against any burger in bham!! If you haven’t been in here yet, check it out. Great wine, cheese, and sandwiches. Chef Josh and the guys are always polite and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you Bill for such a kind review! We’re so glad you enjoyed your Smiley Brothers Burger!

name: garrett bowling
text: Never been here before today but I had the Meatloaf sandwich and it was INCREDIBLE! Will definitely be ordering it again!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in and giving us a try! We’re so glad you loved your sandwich and look forward to seeing you again!

name: mhtate
text: Stopped in to pick up some sandwiches.   The wagyu pastrami was quite tasty but the cons Reuben was a bit too salty for our tastes.   I look forward to going back to try the good selection of cheeses, charcuterie, prepared foods and butcher cuts.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! The Reuben can definitely be a strong flavor! Hopefully you'll be able to stop back in soon and try out our other options!

name: Monique Smith
text: Very knowledgeable staff and owner. Wonderful quality, clean meat options. And when you're there check out the home made pimento cheese and french onion dip!!

resp.text: The French Onion Dip is a favorite all around, we're so glad you enjoyed it!

name: Eddie Stroud
text: Beyond friendly! The kind of old school freibdly helping hand that seems to be to few and far between nowadays. Mr. Smiley knows his meats. I will definitely be back again and highly suggest you visit if you haven't yet already! Great honemade oversized lunch specials. Nowhere anywhere close that can compare to this place.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Eddie! Hope you can come visit us again soon!

name: Owen Stayner/ThisWorkplace360
text: Had the BLT salad... excellent! Good service and nice space.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Owen! We’re so glad you enjoyed your experience!

name: Alabama Sedan
text: I really enjoyed my first visit to Smiley Brothers. Had no idea it was an excellent Deli as well as a butcher shop! I will definitely go back often to enjoy the ambience as well as the food.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review and we hope you can stop by again soon!

Amazing Experience! Staff took time to explain all menu items and the sandwich I had was delicious!

Highly recommend the pickles as well.

resp.text: Mmmmm, the pickles are definitely a fan favorite! Thank you for stopping in and we're so glad you enjoyed everything!

name: Ashley Winslett
text: Im new to the whole steak buying thing and honestly don't know what I'm doing. The people were so helpful. They answered my questions and never once made feel intimidated by the experience. The steaks were amazing! Looking forward to trying the deli. Keep up the great work.

resp.text: Thank you Ashley! We hope you stop in again soon!

text: very over priced......i bought a ribeye bone in from them....not good for the money i paid......much better ribeye on sale at piggly wiggly..

name: Lorraine Reeves
text:
From the moment you walk in, you are greeted by a friendly and helpful staff.  Fresh vegetables and any type of infused olive oils you can imagine.  The cheese display is incredible, and the staff is more than happy to give you a sample of any you would like to try.  Let's not forget the meat!  You can see the dry aging of beef in process.  It takes about thirty days to age the beef.  I bought a ready to cook meal that includes chunks of prime beef, carrots, onions, celery, potatoes, a half bulb of garlic, tomato paste and a red wine jus.  Cooked it in my dutch oven, and it was perfect.  I didn't have to cut up the vegetables or meat, so it was a great time-saver.  Did I mention the filets?  Bought two dry-aged and they grill to fork tender.  The flavor is certainly better than regular filets from the grocery store.  All meat is butchered in-house, by well-trained chefs and the house-made sausage is unique, yes classic.  I also bought pork chops that must have been over an inch thick.
I highly recommend you buy from this specialty food store!

resp.text: Lorraine, thank you SO MUCH for your incredibly kind words. We strive everyday to make sure each guest loves their Smiley Brother experience both in shop and once they take their purchases home. We hope you come back to see us soon!

name: preston naish
text: Stop what your doing and come eat here! Amazing food!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Marty! Thank you for your kind words and feedback! I hope you've stopped back in lately to see that we have added more seating for folks to enjoy in store!

name: Carrie Deal
text: So this happened about two years ago but I still think about it to this day. My boyfriend used to do business with this place and has an abundant of stories involving the cleanliness of this establishment. One story being he came across a dead rat on the floor. Another being that they never clean anything where the biggest problem is the cross  contamination. He witnessed almost all employees not wearing gloves in the kitchen Let's just say I'm happy I've learned about this information so I don't ever eat there and thus why I am letting people know.

name: Rose Garden
text: I tried to call before going to the market ... well no one answered the phone so I had to go by Wal-Mart to get a few things and decided to go by the seafood and meat market , cause I needed 3 pounds of shrimp, well the rude lady told me she didn't have any shrimp but there was a truck that showed up while I was still there to pick up 30ty pounds of shrimp and because they called ahead of time they had her shrimp ... I'm standing in the freezing cold weather and when I told the lady I tried to call way before 2 but noone would answer the phone so if she had 30ty pounds for this lady why couldn't she manage to let me buy 3 pounds and it was Christmas Eve and she really needs to be a better employee for yall so you don't loose customers because I will never buy anything from this place again . Ok rant over just thought I'd share with the people of Bay Minette  that this lady was rude and did not have the spirit of Christmas or even had a kind heart for people wanting to pay money for the seafood ..  I sure hope she doesn't do all your customers the way she did me .

name: Jennifer Terrell
text: This place is wonderful. The staff was very friendly and attentive

name: THAMES
text: Good clean facility with some of the most beautiful meat you can find.

name: Racheal Abshire
text: This is for the market. Not restaurant. Called ahead waited 45 minutes for crawfish as instructed. Get there to be told I had ordered crabs not crawfish. It does not take 45 minutes for crab legs to steam! I said no ma'am. I specifically said medium crawfish and you told me 4.99 a pound. The woman was very rude. She gives me a total of 27.67 then proceeds charge me 28.70. When I asked what the difference was I was told it's a service fee for using a debit card. I said I wasn't told and she proceeds to move things off the counter and snarky says that there was a sign right here.  I will not be back. Customer service is horrible.  I previously had ordered 2 sacks of live for an event only to be called the night before and told they would not have them available! Not nearly enough notice! Thought I would try again since reviews were decent. Nope. Strike 2   I'm done! Buyer beware.

name: janet williams
text: After getting sick from eating meat from a chain store in the past, I am very cautious about buying meat from just anywhere, and I get very concerned about making any changes in my buying habits. With the recent price hikes in meat prices, I felt it had came time to look for a more reasonable option. I can gladly say I am so glad I founds Gary's Custom Retail Meats. I purchased a good selection of meats, and we have not been disappointed. The hamburger meat is awesome, taste like it doesn't even have any fillers, almost like ground steak! Gary and his wife offer a nice clean store, along with an excellent variety of meat options, and at a lower price than most local stores. The trip to Rainsville is well worth the quality and the price savings. I do not think you will be disappointed! 5+⭐

name: Crystal McClaflin
text: Very poor beef processing. Cuts are look unrecognisable. Gave him several chances. Each time our customers where unhappy with the butchering

We picked up some filet mignon  for the grill tonight,they were fantastic ! we picked up other stakes as well as bacon,sausage,and some beets. name: NOT ME!!
text:
Well..  i do know they are selling Aged Cheese... i seen this today... 4-15-2018...

To the store owner... Rodger...
My husband was in the store a while back and he told me you approached him ....and told him to tell me ... you want to see me....
I havnt had time to specifically stop in and see you...
I assume you want to speak to me about this particular review....

If my review is pressing you for any reason and you truly want to speak to me  feel free to send me a email message...

This is the very first  time i have ever heard of a business owner confronting a customer over a freedom of speech review....providing this review is the issue...thank you for taking the time to read your stores reviews..

resp.text:
Thank you for your good review. We are glad that we have met your expectation. Please  let others know through word of the mouth which goes a long way than regular advertisement.
We are here to serve you & your needs.
Thank you
Big B Grocery
Roger Bhatt

Way to go Mr. Owner with your one man show. Kudos to you.

name: Joy Cato
text: Great place to shop! It’s really close to my parents house. Since I come home often from Georgia, this is really convenient.

name: S
text:
I used to go to Big B a lot, we lived close and it was easier than going to Walmart, plus their prices were wonderful.
Then things got worse, our selections became spoiled meat that was repackaged and called "fresh" you could smell it was not, several times we bought packaged veggies at a deal and found mold. Most of their dairy is past it's date but they wash them off so there are no dates and then tell you, "you can either buy it or go somewhere else".
So now we drive to town to buy our stuff or go next door to Dollar General, because we know their stuff isn't rotten or expired. Also when looking up the health score online it doesn't show that Big B has a current health department rating, this is alarming on so many levels.

name: JERRY JAMES
text: Need a good view of meat case w/prices. I live about 20 miles from you and would like to check out your meats, especially. I am sick of walmart's ripping me off. I would love to get a weekly ad.

name: Sully Sammy
text: Every time I go to Big B, which isn't very often, there is someone smoking right next to the door. My 3 year old daughter and I have asthma really bad and are highly allergic to cigarette smoke. That is the reason why I don't go there very often. I only go when I need to pick up something quick.

resp.text:
HI Randi
i am sorry that happen to you but please let me know next time when you here because our employee  is not allowed to smoke by the door  but designated smoking area and we have only two employee who smokes  but i have not catch them smoking by the door but please let me know while you are here

sorry for your suffering
and always thank you for kind remarks

name: Landon Bragg
text: This used to be a great place to shop. They had decent prices on good quality meats, fresh produce, and friendly staff. I took my last trip out to Big B's today (10/10/18) only to find they'd closed an hour and a half early. They cover expiration dates with "sale" stickers, chop expired produce in "stir fry" mixes, and leave a ton of fat face down on meats seemingly to increase weight. I can't count the number of times I've seen expired dairy or milk here. Pic'N Sav in Oxford or Anniston both sells the same generic products, but at much lower prices. It just doesn't make sense why the owner would be okay with running a store this way.  Save yourself the hastle and shop somewhere else.

name: Joann Mayne
text: Only been there once but seems to be a pretty good place with decent prices +10%

resp.text: Thank you we do our best to keep our prices below of competitors and we do not charge 10% surcharge  and you only pay a 7% sales tax.  Please come back and shop often!

text: Wide selection of products for a small grocery store. Cashiers are friendly. The store and parking lot are always clean. No line: in, out, & back home cooking in no time.

name: Bri “Brizz” Lynn
text: The staff is very nice and the head man of the meat department is very nice. The whole place was worth the 20 minute drive just to get Oxtails. They also have get them fresh and their packs are way more but cost less than the prepackaged ones they get in. But make sure you call first to have some held. They were good a d meaty. I will definitely be back!

name: Joe Funny
text: Clean store and comfortable atmosphere, but seems to lack management in individual departments, the meat prices are great and very professional looking cuts, the manager( I'm assuming) is very boisterous and obscene, shouting vulgar words to his employees and that to me makes me not even want to come back to the store, let alone buy anything from his department, im not sure of the managers name, Dan or something,Everyone was busy working and he's got nothing better to do than fuss to them about breaks, and whatnot, those walls are thin and you can hear very well what is said back there, I rang the bell and the old man with short hair just simply stares at me and then continues working, not sure I'll be back to this store, they need a management overhaul asap or they'll lose more customers than just me.

name: Mike “Pirate” Johnson
text: Great selection, plenty of room in and between the aisles. The couple of employees I had any interaction with were friendly and knowledgeable. Very clean and tidy. No windows though. Usually the front wall of a grocery store is all, if not then mostly, windows. Not this store, just the glass entrance and exit door. Other than that, great place

text: Doesn't have cartons of goats milk, no clams or lobstahs, in other words i would like to see more heath food choices like seaweed, no added sugars, no added artificial sugars flavors colors msg gmo more natural flavors colors sugars farm fresh grass fed health foods at reasonable prices

here to Opps every 2weeks to do my shopping the prices are unbeatable there's always specials on sale great selections on quality meats and cheeses shelves well stocked and environmentally clean shopping environment not to speak of the friendly employees and managers

name: billy phillips
text: Good prices, down to earth people who work there. Why would you go a elsewhere

name: Heatherly Smith
text: Had a variety of vegetables and meats look fresh.  The facility was clean and the people were nice.

name: David T. Senn
text: Great service friendly staff

name: Joe Johnson
text: A good place to shop. No frills, but that's okay, and the workers are always pleasant.

name: Allen Scofield
text: Very convenient,right around the corner. Almost always have what I need.

name: Donna Frost
text: Great prices. Good meats! Friendly service!

name: Joyel Franklin
text: Great Deals! Fresh meats Great place to stretch ye dollar!

name: Donald Means
text: Great deals on all of the meat.

name: Syonia Miller
text: Popped in to get some fried chicken. 8 pieces For only $4.99 Its the best in town!

name: kevin familia
text: It's actually not that bad, it's really chill everyone is always doing there job, you don't have to worry about anybody watching over you. If your in opp my recommendation is don't go to iga! Super Karen's work and shop there!!!!

name: LaSaundra Martin
text: Good sale prices stock up when you can. Friendly and helpful employees great customer service

name: Donnie Kennington
text: Like this grocery outlet..well stocked..much more to choose from than grocery outlet in Enterprise..more space

name: Daniel Donaldson
text: Great staff and cheap prices.

name: Christy Elrod
text: This is little town country grocery store prices are great people are very friendly love it here

name: Dawanna Laird
text: Love this store great savings

name: Joshua Demers (Zazu)
text: I only had a limited experience but it was pleasant.

name: Larry Wratchford
text: Need more variety of canned dog food

name: April Jackson
text: Clean environment, friendly and helpful employees. Not enough variety of product selections

name: Sandra Maddox
text: I love the store but being handicapped, I wish they had electric wheelchairs.

name: Audrey Huggins
text: I really like this little store, but ..... It would be nicer if the ceiling wasn't in the verge of collapse and leaking like a sieve every time it rains.

name: alan and rosey adventures
text: Buy all my groceries hear great prices

name: Terry Moore
text: Good store

name: Linda Umbarger
text: I like the people who are working here as they are willing to go the extra mile for their customers.  I am handicapped and unable to do heavy loading from my grocery cart to the car. And, they make sure that the groceries are bagged in a manageable way for me. They are always good-natured and happy to be of service.

name: Donald Phillips
text: A pretty good selection on most everything you may need. Prices were competitive in my opinion. Staff was friendly and no long waits at checkout.

name: April Tompkins
text: I love your place

name: Barbara Boyd
text: Friendly, helpful, and clean

name: Tracy Brooks
text: A good grocery store with all the popular brands at semi disconted prices, the meat department is good too. They sell there groceries at cost plus 10%,if it wasn't for the sales tax it would be a pretty good deal.

name: cristina ANGYLOVER
text: Excellent service

name: Janice Newman
text: Too expensive

name: Sammy Pio Sr
text: Pretty much kept stocked

name: Glenda Williams
text: Very clean and friendly place this was my first time there

name: Zabreyah Lane
text: The employees were nice and helpful it was my first time shopping there

name: Rex Brannon
text: Great experience of good groceries and meat,dog food , chicken scratch, pellets, and Deer corn and other great deals.

name: SpadeGhostVampire7777
text: It has the basic necessities like dairy, canned food, soda, Florida Non-Concentrated Citrus drinks, a produce section, Iced cream, beer, and medical stuff. If your from the city, it is like the Dollar store, a mini-mart, only bigger.

name: Tina Morgan
text: Found everything I needed.  May not have been the name brand but it was just as good.

name: Jottreuna Sinkfield
text: Great I love everyone there especially my aunt cresia

name: Teonna Patrick
text: Great prices very helpful and friendly staff

name: Laura Leigh Brown
text: The store was dirty I've never seen it like that before the produce was awful nothing looked fresh and nothing exciting you know you going to produce department and it's supposed to be the wow part of the store it wasn't it just didn't anything for me I didn't buy very many groceries less than $20 worth and I usually spend a pretty good bit in there just I don't know what to write you the store just didn't look good I mean I will be back Grocery Outlet good store Friendly people you know I don't have a problem with the people it's just that today when I went the store look really bad

name: Ronnie Grissett
text: Prices are reasonable. Fast service.

name: Mary Kelley
text: Good choice of meats,nice people. Find stuff in there,you might not find in Walmart. Every shelf is stock.

name: Carol McCormick
text: Cheep meats great buys a perfect place to get cheep food

name: Tj Cotton
text: Very good prices and very nice people that work there :-) would recommend this place over any place in Andalusia and florala :-)

name: Hector Perez
text:
(Translated by Google) Exselent place of everything a little

(Original)
Exselente lugar de todo un poco

name: Rachel Gilbert
text: I bought their filet mignon. It was the most tender steak I and the 3 people who ate them had ever eaten.

name: Kat Travis
text: Had the best Italian food ever from George's!! It was SO GOOD, I can not wait to go back and try the others. Bertolone's makes an amazingly good dish.  Great people and great food!

name: Jay Collier
text: Great locally owned family business!  Very friendly atmosphere.  Nestled in historic downtown Wetumpka!  They always have a great selection of different cuts of meat.  You will not regret trying them!

name: Jessica Joyner
text: This place was amazing! The Gentleman at the counter explained their process and what items were offered beyond their meat selections. I bought some chicken, hamburger patties, and a hash brown casserole. The chicken was hands down the BEST ever! Hamburger patties were good too; (My BF stated they were a little too lean.) however, I wanted to go back the next day and stock up, but they were closed by 3:00 pm on Saturday and they don't reopen till Tuesday. Will go this Friday after work and stock up! It's all local and fresh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed Jessica! You can always add an egg or two to our ground beef to fatten it out if needed. That’s what we do when we take home a leaner pack. 😉 Thanks for supporting our business!

name: Keegan Smith
text: Very nice, and helpful. Quaint little shop nestled in ther historic part of wetumpka. Great variety,  with cutible options if you don't see what your looking for.

name: Wesley Stewart
text: Went for the first time this weekend. Customer service was great. We purchased some sausage and crawfish Mac and cheese, both were amazing. My wife and I can't wait to try a steak. Will be back for sure.

name: Dorothy Priest
text: Excellent quality and superior service. Highly recommend

name: Rene Petrey
text: World class folks and meats.  Do yourself a favor and head on in!

name: John Holloway
text: First time there was last Saturday, bought 2 filet mignon and was the best I've ever had. AWESOME

resp.text: Thanks John! We’re glad you enjoyed!

name: Mark Self
text: Always great service and great meats!

name: Mary Cronian
text: Ordered my Thanksgiving turkey today

name: Margaret Self
text: Quality of meat is unsurpassed.

name: Mary burkholder
text: Meat is always tender

name: Tracy Baldwin
text: Best steak in Wetumpka

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed! Thank you Tracy!!
